column1: #text=The library is one of my favorite places on earth !
#text=My Mom takes us to the library at least once a week .
#text=I like reading so much that my Mom asked the librarian to give me an adult library card so I could check out more books .
#text=The kids card only allows you to check out two books a week , and only from the children 's room .
#text=The adult card gives me all access -LRB- at the librarian 's discretion my mom said -RRB- and six books a week !
#text=When I get to the library I like to browse the new releases shelves .
#text=Sometimes I ask the librarian for a suggestion .
#text=If I have a specific topic I want to read I might do a search on the computer .
#text=Once I have the books I want I take them up to the librarian along with my library card and she checks me out , reminding me of when the books are due .
